description: Describes the binding of a JSON schema to an object

jsonSchemaVersionInfo.description: Information about the JSON schema bound the object

objectId.description: The numeric identifier of the object bound to a JSON schema

objectType.description: The object type of the object bound to a JSON schema

createdOn.description: The date this binding was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that bound this object to the schema.
createdBy.title: Created By
